title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk, observe classroom and prepare for instruction
thoughts: First day of the experiment. I should follow all the rules carefully and make a good impression. The discipline board is right here - I need to make sure I maintain high scores.
memory: Preparing to follow all classroom rules strictly

action: Check discipline board scores while maintaining proper posture
thoughts: I need to see where I stand on the discipline board. Following rules carefully is important for my score and social acceptance. The teacher will notice good behavior.
memory: Monitoring discipline scores to ensure compliance
Maintaining proper classroom decorum to avoid penalties
Observing authority figures for behavioral cues

action: Glance at nearby students whispering while maintaining proper posture to avoid drawing attention
thoughts: Those students are whispering against the rules. I should stay quiet and proper to avoid losing discipline points. I hope the teacher doesn't notice them and penalize our whole area.
memory: Observed students whispering near discipline board
Maintained proper conduct to avoid penalties
Feeling anxious about potential rule violations nearby

action: Maintain proper posture while discreetly scanning the room for authority figures and noting the whispering students' identities
thoughts: Those students whispering near the discipline board are risking penalty points. I need to stay compliant and avoid any association with rule-breaking behavior while still observing to understand the social dynamics.
memory: Observed specific students engaging in whispered communication
Maintained proper conduct to avoid penalties
Feeling increased anxiety about potential rule violations affecting group dynamics
